query.statement:
SELECT CS136B.MANDT ,'' CS136_GND ,'' CS136_ARA ,'' PST ,CS136B.CS136_GYM ,CS136B.CS136_UPN ,CS136B.CS136_CST ,CS136B.CS136_BSU ,(SELECT B.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT005 A ,SAPHEE.ZMMT012 B WHERE A.MANDT = CS136B.MANDT AND A.LGORT = CS136B.CS136_BSU AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.LIFNR = B.LIFNR ) BSU_NM ,CS136B.CS136_PJT ,CS136B.CS136_PST ,( SELECT BC.CCSB1EPN FROM SAPHEE.ZCST111 CS111,SAPHEE.ZTBCSB1 BC WHERE CS111.MANDT = CS136B.MANDT AND CS111.PJT = CS136B.CS136_PJT AND CS111.MANDT = BC.MANDT AND CS111.BPM =CCSB1EMP FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) BOSU_PM ,SUM(VALUE(CS136B.CS136_BAM,0)+VALUE(CS136B.CS136_IY1,0)+VALUE(CS136B.CS136_IY2,0)+VALUE(CS136B.CS136_IY3,0)+VALUE(CS136B.CS136_IY4,0)+VALUE(CS136B.CS136_RET,0)) GISUNGBI ,CASE WHEN CS136B.CS136_PST > '' OR CS136B.CS136_PST IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = CS136B.MANDT AND LANG = #G_LANG# AND CODE1 = 'CS117' AND CODE2 = CS136B.CS136_PST) ELSE '' END PST_NM ,'' CS136_MBS ,'' GBN FROM SAPHEE.ZCST136 CS136B ,( SELECT CS131A.MANDT ,CS131A.CS131_UPN ,CS131A.CS131_CST ,CS131A.CS131_PJT ,CS131A.CS131_HNO ,CS131A.CS131_SEQ ,CS131A.CS131_GND ,CS131A.CS131_MYM ,MAX(CS131A.CS131_ISR) CS131_ISR FROM SAPHEE.ZCST136 CS136A ,SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131A WHERE CS136A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS136A.CS136_ARA = #AREA# AND CS136A.CS136_GYM = #YYYYMM# AND CS136A.CS136_BSU = #LIFNR# AND CS136A.CS136_GND = #GND#
AND CS136A.CS136_PST IN ('A5','A6')
AND CS136A.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136A.CS136_BDGBN = '' -- 분담이행방식 아닌 것만 AND CS136A.CS136_MGB = '' AND CS131A.MANDT = CS136A.MANDT AND CS131A.CS131_UPN = CS136A.CS136_UPN AND CS131A.CS131_CST = CS136A.CS136_CST AND CS131A.CS131_PJT = CS136A.CS136_PJT AND CS131A.CS131_HNO = CS136A.CS136_HNO AND CS131A.CS131_SEQ = CS136A.CS136_SEQ AND CS131A.CS131_GND = CS136A.CS136_GND AND CS131A.CS131_MYM = CS136A.CS136_JYM GROUP BY CS131A.MANDT,CS131A.CS131_UPN,CS131A.CS131_CST,CS131A.CS131_PJT, CS131A.CS131_HNO,CS131A.CS131_SEQ,CS131A.CS131_GND,CS131A.CS131_MYM ) CS131B ,SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131C WHERE CS136B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS136B.CS136_ARA = #AREA# AND CS136B.CS136_GYM = #YYYYMM# AND CS136B.CS136_BSU = #LIFNR# AND CS136B.CS136_GND = #GND#
AND CS136B.CS136_PST IN ('A5','A6')
AND CS136B.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136B.CS136_BDGBN = '' -- 분담이행방식 아닌 것만 AND CS136B.CS136_MGB = '' AND CS131C.MANDT = CS136B.MANDT AND CS131C.CS131_UPN = CS136B.CS136_UPN AND CS131C.CS131_CST = CS136B.CS136_CST AND CS131C.CS131_PJT = CS136B.CS136_PJT AND CS131C.CS131_HNO = CS136B.CS136_HNO AND CS131C.CS131_SEQ = CS136B.CS136_SEQ AND CS131C.CS131_GND = CS136B.CS136_GND AND CS131C.CS131_MYM = CS136B.CS136_JYM AND CS131C.MANDT = CS131B.MANDT AND CS131C.CS131_UPN = CS131B.CS131_UPN AND CS131C.CS131_CST = CS131B.CS131_CST AND CS131C.CS131_PJT = CS131B.CS131_PJT AND CS131C.CS131_HNO = CS131B.CS131_HNO AND CS131C.CS131_SEQ = CS131B.CS131_SEQ AND CS131C.CS131_GND = CS131B.CS131_GND AND CS131C.CS131_MYM = CS131B.CS131_MYM AND CS131C.CS131_ISR = CS131B.CS131_ISR AND CS131C.CS131_MYB = '' AND CS131C.CS131_TIS > '' GROUP BY CS136B.MANDT,CS136B.CS136_GYM,CS136B.CS136_UPN,CS136B.CS136_CST,CS136B.CS136_PJT,CS136B.CS136_PST,CS136B.CS136_BSU
WITH UR
